segments.text: We're on the same team here , Elvin . I'm being nice because we need to get along together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know you , Zina . You're only nice when you want something .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If we want to beat WebTracker , we're going to have to work hand in hand .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be honest , I'm starting to wonder if it's worth it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'd rather lose to WebTracker than do things my way ?
segments.speaker: S1
